## MessageBar.add() method

Adds the given formatted message for the given player, below any existing non-prompt messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
add(player: Player, format: string, ...args: MessageEmbed[]): MessageRow;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  player | [Player](./bge-core.player.md) | Player to add a message for. |
|  format | string | A string containing embed points, for example <code>&quot;Hello {0}&quot;</code> will insert <code>args[0]</code> after the word "Hello ". |
|  args | [MessageEmbed](./bge-core.messageembed.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Optional array of values to embed in the message. |

**Returns:**

[MessageRow](./bge-core.messagerow.md)
